Articles.Content:
Nova X Aerospace had Started the Space Adventure off with a small Kerbonite Probe in Kerbin Orbit. They soon looked towards bigger plans, but first it has to start with its SSTO program which was a vital part to the first big Project for them. The project is to create a Boarding Station in Kerbins Orbit that SSTO's will fly up to with Passengers (Civilians or Workers) and Unload them to Interplanetary Crafts where they will then travel around the solar system. These Interplanetary crafts will range from Colony Ships that will attempt at colonizing and building bases on nearby Planets or moons, to Civilian Commercial Flights. The Station will hold a Crew that will service, unload, and load the crafts as they come in and out as well. The Station will be named Pandora. Nova X has a lot on its plate right now so they start off with the SSTO development.

After 3 experimental planes the "SPS MK1" was finally born. This Plane is named "Prodigy", It is the First of 3 SSTO's that will be used in rotation to fly Passengers up to Pandora. The other two will be named "Legend" and "Champion". The Unique Logo is the "Prodigy's" symbol.

On a early Kerbin Morning two Pilots Allison and Adman took off from KSC in the SPS Mk1 "Prodigy".

They completed the First Mission of the Mk1, which was to fly into a Stable orbit over 120km orbit then Return Safely at KSC. The Initial flight into orbit went by smooth and fast getting into orbit in just about 10 minutes.

Glamour Shot of the Mk1 before re-entry.

And then re-entry, and Landing.

Allison and Adman get out to Smile for the cameras for the Mk1's first Successful mission!

The mission returned with a Wealth of data. First off flying with way too much Oxidizer, I can lower the level by at least half. It will Balance it all out a bit more and also free up some weight. Second work on my landings... Came in really fast so I might need to add some air brakes to them. This is just the start for the Program as the next mission will be to rendezvous with Pandora while its under construction dock then return to KSC. The development of this giant Station is under way. I will be posting pictures and Continuing the Story Soon. For now its bed time, hope you enjoy!
